name: Lollipop: Link & Match
description:
What a treat!
Lollipop : Link & Match is a sweet new twist on the match-3 games that everyone has come to love!
A FREE link match-3 game that allows you to connect the same-colored lollipops in ANY way to make a sweet chain. Upward, downward, diagonally…. The possibilities are endless!

Don't miss out this fun and relaxing game enjoyed by everyone of all ages!
Your quick thinking and strategic skills are rewarded with delicious rainbow-colored cascades and tasty candy combos!


Download NOW! Once you start, it’ll be hard to put down!

HOW TO PLAY
• Match 3 or more lollipops of the same color.
• Special boosters & items will help you pass super sticky levels.
• Connect all the lollipops with minimal moves to score higher.

FEATURES

• TONS OF UNIQUE LEVELS
- Over 200 fun and unique levels
- Experience all the different challenges and puzzles!

• EASY AND FUN PLAY
- Easy to learn and fun to master gameplay.

• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
- You can play anytime, anywhere!

• STUNNING GRAPHICS
- Soothing sounds and gorgeous visual effects

NOTES
• Lollipop : Link & Match contains ads like interstitial, video and house ads.
• Lollipop : Link & Match is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items like AD FREE and coins.

App Permissions

[Required Permissions]
- None

[Optional Permissions]
- Photo / Media / File: required storage access permission to save game data

Let’s start to match and link our way to sweet victory!
Thank you for playing!
